sn47.40:1.1: “Satipatthananca vo, bhikkhave, desessami satipatthanabhavananca satipatthanabhavanagamininca patipadam.
sn47.40:1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;
sn47.40:1.7: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.40:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu samudayadhammanupassi kayasmim viharati, vayadhammanupassi kayasmim viharati, samudayavayadhammanupassi kayasmim viharati, atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.40:2.5: samudayadhammanupassi dhammesu viharati, vayadhammanupassi dhammesu viharati, samudayavayadhammanupassi dhammesu viharati, atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.40:3.3: sammaditthi, sammasankappo, sammavaca, sammakammanto, sammaajivo, sammavayamo, sammasati, sammasamadhi.
